reviews.review_msg: Dr. Timcke is often regarded as a misunderstood lecturer however, do what is asked such as reading and making use of office hours and you will be fine.
awful!! dont ever take a tutorial with him hes the worst T.A. ive ever had

Gary is a great professor. He's a really down-to-earth kind of guy, who always has something interesting to say. I would definitely recommend taking this class, and although this is the only course I have taken with him thus far, I would recommend any of the courses he teaches. Cool guy, decent class.

You really don't need to attend his lectures. Although they can be entertaining, and pretty interesting. If you read the parts of the textbook required for the assignments and exam and go to tutorials you'll do well, without even going to lecture.

I had Roman for Comm 110 and 210 in 2008-2009 and the guy is still the best prof I've ever had. I went into Comm thinking it was going to be boring but he made it extremely FUN with his good humour and teaching style. Overall a great prof who knows his stuff but is willing to take in others' perspectives on issues; discussions were very engaging.
